subtitle: Abhisamācārikā-Dharma-Vinaya of the Ārya Mahāsāṃghika-Lokottaravādins and the Pali Vinaya of the Theravādins
title: A comparative study of Abhisamācārikā
subjects: Tripiṭaka. -- Vinayapiṭaka. -- Abhisamācārikā -- Criticism, interpretation, etc

notes.value:
Originally presented as the author's dissertation (doctoral--University of Bihar, Muzaffarpur, 1976).

Includes bibliographical references (p. [223]-224) and indexes.

Includes the English translation of the Chinese translation of the Buddhist Hybrid Sanskrit root text.
